descs.desc: * Wasted stat points: If a gift provides a large negative stat
bonus (e.g. Crumbling Armor -20 HP), then when upgrading that
stat it would not actually improve it.
* Crumbling Armor gift kills agents after being replaced - When
an agent that started the day with Crumbling Armor’s gift later
replaced the gift, they would still die from Attachment work.
